text: James Naanman Daman (April 10, 1956 - January 12, 2015) was a Nigerian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1982. Daman was named bishop of the Diocese of Jalingo, Nigeria, in 2000. He was named the first bishop of the Diocese of Shendam in 2007.James Naanman Daman Daman died on January 12, 2015 at the age of 58 in Jalingo. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Nigerian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Taraba State
title: James Naanman Daman
